mapper.select: select mem_code from member where id=#{id}

select rownum as item_indexnum, i_cat, mem_code, i_name, i_unit_amount, to_char(i_apply_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as i_apply_date from (select a.i_unit_amount, a.mem_code, a.i_apply_date, c.i_cat, m.i_name from item_apply a, item_cat c, item m where a.i_code = m.i_code and m.i_cat_code = c.i_cat_code order by a.i_apply_code) where mem_code=#{mem_code}
